forum.content:
Hi guys,

I'm a native Australian, born and raised in Sydney. I wish to make new friends in Taiwan and I can assist anyone with any questions regarding Australia/Sydney life.

One of my closest Taiwanese friends just left to Australia today for working holiday so I wish to find new friends to fill in the void.

My Chinese is okay, but I cannot read or write well. So it would be easier to speak Chinese or to converse in English.

Looking forward to make new friends :)
Andy
forum.title: Australian here..
